text: Mark Treitel co-wrote with Shoe Schuster the 2005 pilot for NBC The Sperm Donor. Mark also starred in the NBC cable station Bravo reality television show Situation: Comedy. ==External links== * *Mark Treitel *Bravo's Situation: Comedy *Celebrity Blogs Category:American television writers Category:American male television writers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
